articles.title: Luke Bryan, Lionel Richie comment on Caleb Kennedy's 'American Idol' exit - Entertainment Weekly News
articles.description: "We get emotionally involved in these kids," said Luke Bryan. "We want the best for Caleb."
articles.content:
The American Idol judges have spoken out about contestant Caleb Kennedy's departure from the show, after a controversial video leaked online.

articles.title: Stimulus check update: Child tax credit up to $300 a month coming July 15, IRS announces - NJ.com
articles.description: The child tax credit is part of the $1.9 trillion American Rescue Plan passed in March.
